doc:
Edward Jobson (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Jobson_(actor) 0 Edward Jobson (February 29, 1860 – February 7, 1925) was an American actor of stage and silent film. He started in silent films in his fifties. He had a sour yet sad bulldog demeanor and can be spotted in several surviving silent films. In The Delicious Little Devil (1919) he plays Rudolph Valentino's father, though the two actors looked nothing alike. He died at the beginning of 1925. Edward_Jobson ( February_29_,_1860 – February_7_,_1925 ) was an_American_actor of stage and silent_film . He started in silent_films in his_fifties . He had a_sour_yet_sad_bulldog_demeanor and can_be_spotted in several_surviving_silent_films . In The_Delicious_Little_Devil ( 1919 ) he plays Rudolph_Valentino 's_father , though the_two_actors looked nothing alike . He died at the_beginning of 1925 .
